docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Learn how to integrate and use our powerful API with comprehensive guides, examples, and API references.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.content:
Get started with Scripto in just a few steps:

  1. Install the package using npm or yarn
  2. Initialize the client with your API key
  3. Make your first API call

Here's a basic example:

import { ScriptoClient } from '@scripto/client';

const client = new ScriptoClient('YOUR_API_KEY');
const response = await client.process('Hello, world!');

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.content:
All API requests must be authenticated using an API key. Include your API key in the Authorization header:

Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
